pullRequest.title: Add support for Cors Origin requests on the Beacon Node Rest API
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
This PR enables Cors support for all origins so that HTTP calls from browser work normally.
Changes summary

Added --rest-api-cors-origins CLI option to BeaconRestApiOptions
Updated GlobalConfiguration and GlobalConfigurationBuilder accordingly
Added unit tests to BeaconRestApiOptionsTest to cover the new option
Updated existing unit test in BeaconRestApiOptionsTest that reads from a configuration file to add the new option and a missing option (--rest-api-host-allowlist)

Testing
Tested using axios.
Request from browser
const response = await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:5051/eth/v1/node/identity');
console.log(response);
teku --network=minimal \
--data-path=$ETH2_TEKU_DATA \
--eth1-endpoint=http://localhost:8545 \
--eth1-deposit-contract-address=$ETH2_DEPOSIT_CONTRACT_ADDRESS \
--initial-state=$ETH2_TEKU_INITIAL_STATE \
--rest-api-enabled \
--rest-api-cors-origins="http://127.0.0.1:8080,http://localhost:8080"
